exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set a : ad a0 : A Unable to unify "Prop" with "lattice_bounded_def_2 A (M1 A a a0)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (a : ad) (a0 : A), lattice_bounded_def_2 A (M1 A a a0)

Premises:
M1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> Map A
ad = N : Set
lattice_bounded_def_2 : forall A : Set, Map A -> Prop
lattice_bounded_6 : forall A : Set, lattice_bounded_def_2 A (M0 A)
in_dom_remove : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a0 a : ad), in_dom A a (MapRemove A m a0) = negb (a =? a0)%N && in_dom A a m
in_M1_id : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (x : ad) (e : A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M1 A x e) c = Some a) -> a = e
MapPut_semantics_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (a0 : ad), MapGet A (MapPut A (M0 A) a y) a0 = MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0
MapDelta_semantics_2_2 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (m' : Map A) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0 = Some y0 -> MapGet A m' a0 = None -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a y) m') a0 = Some y0
MapDelta_semantics_2_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (m' : Map A) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0 = None -> MapGet A m' a0 = Some y0 -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a y) m') a0 = Some y0
MapDelta_semantics_3_1 : forall (A : Type) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A) (m' : Map A) (a : ad) (y y' : A), MapGet A (M1 A a0 y0) a = Some y -> MapGet A m' a = Some y' -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a0 y0) m') a = None
MapDelta_semantics_1_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (m' : Map A) (a0 : ad), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0 = None -> MapGet A m' a0 = None -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a y) m') a0 = None
M1_canon : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon A (M1 A a y)
MapPut_semantics_2_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y y' : A) (a0 : ad), MapGet A (MapPut A (M1 A a y) a y') a0 = (if (a =? a0)%N then Some y' else None)
alist_semantics_tail : forall (A : Type) (l : alist A) (a : ad) (y : A), alist_sorted_2 A ((a, y) :: l)%list -> eqm A (alist_semantics A l) (fun a0 : ad => if (a =? a0)%N then None else alist_semantics A ((a, y) :: l)%list a0)
MapCard_M1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A), MapCard A (M1 A a y) = 1
MapPut_behind_as_Merge_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapPut_behind A m a y = MapMerge A (M1 A a y) m
MapPut_as_Merge_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapPut A m a y = MapMerge A m (M1 A a y)
in_dom_M1_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A), in_dom A a (M1 A a y) = true
map_sum : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), m = M0 A \/ (exists (a : ad) (x : A), m = M1 A a x) \/ (exists x y : Map A, m = M2 A x y)
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Set), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
M1_semantics_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a = Some y
MapPut_as_Merge : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), eqmap A (MapPut A m a y) (MapMerge A m (M1 A a y))
MapPut_behind_as_Merge : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), eqmap A (MapPut_behind A m a y) (MapMerge A (M1 A a y) m)
in_dom_M1 : forall (A : Type) (a a0 : ad) (y : A), in_dom A a0 (M1 A a y) = (a =? a0)%N
MapRemove_as_RestrBy_c : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : B), MapRemove A m a = MapDomRestrBy A B m (M1 B a y)
prechain_sum : forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), (exists x : Map A, p = single A x) \/ (exists (x : Map A) (y : prechain A), p = concat A y x)
in_dom_M1_2 : forall (A : Type) (a a0 : ad) (y : A), in_dom A a0 (M1 A a y) = true -> a = a0
MapPut_semantics_2 : forall (A : Type) (a a' : ad) (y y' : A) (a0 : ad), MapGet A (MapPut A (M1 A a y) a' y') a0 = (if (a' =? a0)%N then Some y' else if (a =? a0)%N then Some y else None)
in_dom_put_behind : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A) (a : ad), in_dom A a (MapPut_behind A m a0 y0) = (a =? a0)%N || in_dom A a m
in_dom_put : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A) (a : ad), in_dom A a (MapPut A m a0 y0) = (a =? a0)%N || in_dom A a m
M1_semantics_2 : forall (A : Type) (a a' : ad) (y : A), (a =? a')%N = false -> MapGet A (M1 A a y) a' = None
MapPut_behind_as_before : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A) (a0 : ad), (a =? a0)%N = false -> MapGet A (MapPut A m a y) a0 = MapGet A (MapPut_behind A m a y) a0
MapPut_behind_canon : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon A (MapPut_behind A m a y)
MapPut_canon : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon A (MapPut A m a y)
MapPut_semantics_2_2 : forall (A : Type) (a a' : ad) (y y' : A) (a0 a'' : ad), N.lxor a a' = a'' -> MapGet A (MapPut A (M1 A a y) a' y') a0 = (if (a' =? a0)%N then Some y' else if (a =? a0)%N then Some y else None)
in_M2_disj : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (m0 m1 : Map A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M2 A m0 m1) c = Some a) -> (exists c : ad, MapGet A m0 c = Some a) \/ (exists c : ad, MapGet A m1 c = Some a)
MapRemove_as_RestrBy : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : B), eqmap A (MapRemove A m a) (MapDomRestrBy A B m (M1 B a y))
prechain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
MapFold_M1 : forall (A M : Type) (neutral : M) (op : M -> M -> M) (f : ad -> A -> M) (a : ad) (y : A), MapFold A M neutral op f (M1 A a y) = f a y
MapPut_behind_as_before_1 : forall (A : Type) (a a' a0 : ad), (a' =? a0)%N = false -> forall y y' : A, MapGet A (MapPut A (M1 A a y) a' y') a0 = MapGet A (MapPut_behind A (M1 A a y) a' y') a0
MapSubset_Put : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSubset A A m (MapPut A m a y)

original: intros A a a0. apply lattice_bounded_def_2.
